virtualmachine

Class VirtualMachine

  • java.lang.Object
    • virtualmachine.VirtualMachine

  • public class VirtualMachine
extends java.lang.Object
    Virtual Machine This is a virtual machine with debugging capabilities for a simplified assembly language. It has the capabilities of running in the system console or in a custom environment

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      VirtualMachine(int memorySize, DebuggingPanel dp)
      Create a virtual machine
